text: Marek Niedziałkowski (born 9 September 1952) is a Polish rower. He competed in the men's coxless four event at the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Polish male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Poland Category:Rowers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Gdańsk
title: Marek Niedziałkowski
